|brand = D-Link |model = DWL-2100AP |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A4 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/15/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/D-Link_DWL-2100AP_vA1-A4 |wlclass = G54 |series = DWL-2100AP |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = RRK2004042018-1 |icid = 4216A-WL2100AP |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR2313A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 4Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 180 <!-- 180 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Atmel;AT49BV322A-70TI; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Mira;P2V28S40BTP; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP101A; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:19:5B,00:1C:F0,00:22:B0 |oui = 00:19:5B,00:1C:F0,00:22:B0
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RedBoot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.0.50 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WAP-D19 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/15/2004 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 790069263958 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00019EYVG |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR2112; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "8WAPD19..3A1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[Alpha Networks]] WAP-D19
===Chips=== * CPU: [[Atheros]] AR2313A WiSoC * Wireless tranciever: [[Atheros]] AR2112A * Ethernet-MII bridge: IC+ IP101A * Ethernet MDI/X detection: TS6121C * Flash: ''AMD'' M29LV320DB (4MB) * RAM: ''ICSI'' IC42S16800-7T (16MB)
The DD-WRT router database states that A1 uses the AR2312 and the A2/A3/A4 versions use the AR2313A.
====Hardware==== *[http://www.sown.org.uk/wiki/DWL-2100AP DWL-2100AP on '''SOWN Wiki'''] :D-Link Hardware revision: A4, Firmware revision: 2.20EU :*CPU: [[Atheros]] AR2313A-001, B52307B, 0635 TAIWAN :*Flash: ''Spansion'' S29GL032M90TFIR4, 0634CRM-K (4MB) :*RAM: ''ESMT'' M12L128168A-7T, AZG1P536E, 0610 (16MB) :*Eth: ''IC+'' IP101A-LF, 0640C15, KPF0005.1 (10/100Mbps)
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=14050 DWL-2100AP] On the '''DD-WRT''' Forum *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dwl-2100ap_a2 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[https://web.archive.org/web/20060114111758/http://www.mervin.net.au/wireless/template/dwl2100hacks.php How to increase ''DWL-2100AP Power and Frequency Range''] :(via the Wayback Machine) *[https://web.archive.org/web/20060204173942/http://www.wavedale.net/202f.htm More information (in German)] (via the Wayback Machine)
